Pre-Game Insights: Memphis Grizzlies are 22-10 and first in the Southwest Division.
Memphis defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 132-124 on Friday night.
Ja Morant is doubtful for Sunday due to a shoulder injury.
Oklahoma City Thunder are 24-5 and lead the Northwest division by 8 games.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander is scoring an average of 31.1 points per game and handing out an average of 6.1 assists per game.
The Thunder defeated the Indiana Pacers 120-114 on Thursday night with Shai Gilgeous-Alexander tying his career high of 45 points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Final Score Prediction: Oklahoma City Thunder wins and covers ATS 116-105.
